value:
$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_EmbraAnotherThrone_after|$Fi2000|$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Why? Why take the precious lives
of mortals? It is a cruelty.$k$pAnd to take control over their
bodies, and possess them so...$k$pThey fear you now. More and more
come to me, begging for help...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Enough!$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla, for the sake of all that
is to come, you must speak with
them, explain yourself.$k$pLet me help you...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|...I said, ENOUGH!$k$pYou say their lives are precious,
but in truth they are worthless!$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Anger|No, Embla... If that were true, if they
truly meant nothing to you, you
would not be in such pain.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アスク,ch00_42_Ask_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|You cannot hide your care for the
mortals from me. You may have even
deeper love for them than I.$k$pThat is why you cannot bear it
when they turn away from you.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|Enough, enough, ENOUGH!$k$pGet out from my sight! If the
mortals love you so, then so
be it!$k$pThey detest me. May they all
seek your company and be
happy—and leave me alone.$k$pWretched! All of you!$k$p$Sbs5000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|$Fi2000|...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|You... Askr's damned—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Zacharias is dead, never again
to return to us.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But before he died, he wished
for Princess Veronica's safety...$k$pAnd for the safety of both the citizens
of Askr and those of Embla—all whom
you've enclosed in darkness!$k$pI plan to honor that wish, and see
all the peoples of our lands returned
to us!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain2|Just like him... Your words are nothing
but empty promises.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Listen well! Hear the voice
of the god you once worshipped!$k$pLook upon me! See the shape of the
god you once knelt before!$k$pYou wish to live your lives free
of care and worry... I come to
kill that wish.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|I will make you remember who has
done this too you! I will make you
REMEMBER ME!$k$p
$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_F_Disappear,Face_Cool2|Rraahh...nyah... Aagh...$k$pI am...fading away...$k$pNo... Not...alone...$k$pNot again... I... I...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|Askr...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Embla was...lonely.$k$pThat alone may have been the
source of all this pain.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|Veronica...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Embla and I are not entirely
different from one another.$k$pI know loneliness...difficult as it can
be to admit to myself.$k$p$EFace_Cry|That loneliness makes me retreat
inside myself, where I grow lost.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|That must change... I must change.$k$pAs Embla could not.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$bEvBg_AskEmbra_border|$Fi1500|Brother... Please watch over us.
All of us.$k$pFrom here, both Askr and Embla
spread out before our eyes...$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Embla's darkness has faded,
but in order for everyone to return
to their lives...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. There is much we must yet
accomplish before they can.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|We should hurry back to Askr then!
And then, Princess Veronica, we can
work together and help both realms!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|We can, yes.$k$pBut...wait, please, Prince Alfonse,
Princess Sharena. There is something
I must ask you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it? You need not be
so formal. Go on...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Princess Sharena once said that...
when I was free of Embla's curse,
we should...be friends.$k$pThinking back on all that happened...
I know this is not the place I would
choose to ask this of you, but...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Princess Veronica...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|If you two are willing...$k$p$EFace_Blush|Can we...be friends?$k$p$Sbs150|
